column1: #Text=" I really wanted to explode that book , " Reed told The New York Times .
#Text=" I wanted to completely undermine it .

#Text=Is this man who wants to blow up the classic literary canon taught to children in schools a menace , or a messiah ? David Shankbone went to interview him for Wikinews and found that , as often is the case , the answer lies somewhere in the middle .

#Text= The kids have made me a better writer , " Reed said .

column1: #Text=In his new untitled work , which he calls a " new play by William Shakespeare , " he takes lines from The Bard ' s classics to form an original tragedy .
#Text=He began it in 2003 , but only with the birth of his children could he finish it .
#Text=" I did n't understand the characters who had children .
